name: Energy Enhancement System
tagline: Gentle, restorative sessions in a multi-scalar energy field.
summary: A calm, reclined experience designed to support deep relaxation. Guests often report feeling more rested and centered. We combine a peaceful space with time away from notifications to help your nervous system downshift.
benefits: Gentle environment that supports recovery rhythms
Pairs well with sleep and mindfulness habits

name: Red Light Therapy
summary: Targeted light exposure designed to support cellular energy and recovery. Sessions are short and comfortable, making it easy to add to your routine.
benefits: Aims to support recovery after daily strain

name: Hydrogen Water
tagline: Infused water with dissolved molecular hydrogen.
summary: A refreshing option prepared on site. Many people enjoy it pre- or post‑session as part of a general hydration routine.
benefits: Easy add‑on before or after sessions
